name: Apex Exhibition Designs
tag_list: exhibition-stand, exhibition-stands, exhibition-design, exhibition-stand-design, modular-stand, custom-built-stand, bespoke-stand, exhibition-contractor, graphics, pharmaceutical-exhibit, healthcare-stand
overview:
Apex Exhibition Designs, part of the Apex.co.uk creative services group, manages your exhibit from start to finish. For over 25 years Apex has designed, managed, installed and stored exhibition stands for companies all over the world. From our base near Manchester, we regularly service clients needs at all the UK venues in London, Birmingham, Harrogate, and then extensively in all the major European cities. Customers come from a wide range of industries including healthcare & pharmaceuticals to technology, housewares and hospitality.

Extensive in house facilities and expert knowledge and established relationships with the best suppliers, allows us to manage all aspects of exhibiting, including graphics, catering, interactive features, audiovisual, marketing materials and logistics.
